email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.75 per ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel's draft and ETA at Houston? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. The vessel's draft is 16.5m, and ETA at Houston is 14 October. I can offer $50.00 per ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.00 per ton works for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ll review the charter party agreement and get back to you by end of day. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, sounds good. Let me know if you have any questions on the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
